io.dropwizard.logging

Class DropwizardLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase
      • ch.qos.logback.core.LayoutBase<E>

            • io.dropwizard.logging.DropwizardLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.qos.logback.core.Layout<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle

    public class DropwizardLayout
extends ch.qos.logback.classic.PatternLayout
    A base layout for Dropwizard.
    • Disables pattern headers.
    • Prefixes logged exceptions with !.
    • Sets the pattern to the given timezone.
